and str_to_date(#{currentTime},'%H:%i') > str_to_date(l.lesson_time_start,'%H:%i') and str_to_date(l.lesson_time_end,'%H:%i') > str_to_date(#{currentTime},'%H:%i')
and ((str_to_date(l.lesson_time_start,'%H:%i') > str_to_date(#{currentTime},'%H:%i')) or l.lesson_date > #{lessonDate})
and ((str_to_date(#{currentTime},'%H:%i') > str_to_date(l.lesson_time_end,'%H:%i')) or #{lessonDate} > l.lesson_date)
and l.lesson_date = #{lessonDate} and str_to_date(l.lesson_time_start,'%H:%i') > str_to_date(#{currentTime},'%H:%i')
and l.lesson_date > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') and l.lesson_date <= #{lessonDate}
and l.del_flag = 0 and m.del_flag = 0 and m.teach_method = 'TEACH_METHOD_LIVE' and m.publish_status = 'MODULE_PUBLISHED' and m.del_flag = 0 and m.teach_method = 'TEACH_METHOD_LIVE' and m.publish_status = 'MODULE_PUBLISHED' and n.del_flag = 0 group by l.id )AS result
UNION ALL SELECT loc.id FROM live_open_course AS loc
inner join sys_config_teacher t ON (t.id = loc.teacher_id or t.id = loc.assistant_id) and t.user_id = #{teacherId}
WHERE loc.school_id = #{schoolId}
and loc.open_course_name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and ( #{lessonDate} >= loc.start_open_data and loc.end_open_data >= #{lessonDate})
and STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(date_format(#{lessonDate} , '%y-%m-%d'), '', #{currentTime}), '%y-%m-%d %H:%i') > STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(date_format(loc.start_open_data , '%y-%m-%d'), '', loc.start_time), '%y-%m-%d %H:%i') and STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(date_format(loc.end_open_data , '%y-%m-%d'), '', loc.end_time), '%y-%m-%d %H:%i') > STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(date_format(#{lessonDate} , '%y-%m-%d'), '', #{currentTime}), '%y-%m-%d %H:%i')
and str_to_date(#{currentTime},'%H:%i') > str_to_date(loc.start_time,'%H:%i') and str_to_date(loc.end_time,'%H:%i') > str_to_date(#{currentTime},'%H:%i')
and ((loc.start_open_data = #{lessonDate} and str_to_date(loc.start_time,'%H:%i') > str_to_date(#{currentTime},'%H:%i')) or loc.start_open_data > #{lessonDate})
and ((str_to_date(loc.start_time,'%H:%i') > str_to_date(#{currentTime},'%H:%i')) or loc.start_open_data > #{lessonDate})
and ((#{lessonDate} = loc.end_open_data and str_to_date(#{currentTime},'%H:%i') > str_to_date(loc.end_time,'%H:%i')) or #{lessonDate} > loc.end_open_data)
and ((str_to_date(#{currentTime},'%H:%i') > str_to_date(loc.end_time,'%H:%i')) or #{lessonDate} > loc.end_open_data)
and l.lesson_date = #{lessonDate} and str_to_date(l.lesson_time_start,'%H:%i') > str_to_date(#{currentTime},'%H:%i')

and loc.publish_status = 1 and loc.del_flag = 0 ) as moreResult
